name: Lightning Turtle
description:
Ever wanted to become a turtle and jump for your life while lightning shout out from behind you? No?? Well, you can in this game :)

* ENDLESS randomizing gameplay for ENDLESS FUN!!
* 24 different characters to unlock..with more to come!
* Game Center Leaderboards to compete with your friends and achieve world leading high scores!!
* Incredibly fun, and just to reinforce..endless randomized gameplay :)

Download to start having fun today :)
